name.title: Name
name.description: Name by which this variable is referenced throughout the stage.

initialValue.title: Initial Value
initialValue.description: The initial value for this variable when the stage is loaded.

perTurnUpdate.title: Initial Input Update
perTurnUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to immediately following a user's input.

postInputUpdate.title: Final Input Update
postInputUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to after a user's input has been processed (after classifiers have run).

preResponseUpdate.title: Initial Response Update
preResponseUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to immediately following a bot's response.

postResponseUpdate.title: Final Response Update
postResponseUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to after a bot's response has been processed (after classifiers have run).
